Title: Welcome to Israel!
sub_title: Arrival, Registration, & Kick-Off of the Centennial Trip Celebrations!

sub_content.bullet_data: Arrival at Ben Gurion Airport  Assistance provided by an Ayelet Tours Representative
Transfer to The Royal Beach Hotel in Tel Aviv for Check-In  Check-In to The Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv, rest and freshen up
Registration for the Centennial Trip at our hotel, open from 9:00 AM until 9:00 PM

sub_content1.data: Yam Hall, M Floor, Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv
Featuring guest speaker Dr. Esther Carmel-Hakim
Entertainment by the Israeli Philharmonic Orchestra with CHW Hadassim Students

sub_content2.data: Professor Rivka Lazovsky, Chairperson, World WIZO
Dr. Osnat Levtzion-Korach, Director-General, Assaf Harofeh Medical Center
Benny Shay, Principal, CHW Netanya Technological High School
Her Excellency Deborah Lyons, Canadian Ambassador to Israel
The Honourable Ron Huldai, Mayor of Tel Aviv

Endtitle: Overnight at the Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

Title: Breakfast at The Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv
sub_title: Depart from the hotel and drive to Akko

sub_content.bullet_data: Visit the CHW Terry Schwarzfeld (Ottawa) Daycare in Akko
Lunch at the renowned Chef's restaurant, Uri Buri (kosher style menu) Winner of Trip Advisor's 'Best Restaurant in the Middle East 2016'
Visit the city of Akko, where we explore the Crusader-era fortifications, the Citadel, British Prison, and learn about the current challenges the city faces as a mixed Jewish/Arab city
We drive south to Haifa and enjoy a gorgeous panoramic view from Mt. Carmel

second_title: Visit and Dinner at CHW Nahalal Youth Village

sub_content1.data: Opening Night Event with Entertainment Program featuring Guy & Yahel

sub_content2.data: Eyal Betser, Mayor of Emek Israel
Lieutenant General Shaul Mofaz, Former Minister of Defense

Endtitle: Overnight at the Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

Title: Israeli Entrepreneurship & CHW Hadassim Children and Youth Village
sub_title: Breakfast at The Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

sub_content.bullet_data: Depart from hotel and drive to CHW Hadassim Children and Youth Village
Visit CHW Hadassim Children and Youth Village and enjoy lunch at the facility

Meet with successful entrepreneur and CHW Netanya Tech graduate, Adi Avital. Owner of Anita, a popular and quickly growing international chain of gelaterias. Adi, with his former teacher and mentor, Nurit Peled, will be on hand to meet with you to share his story, and some of his delicious gelato.
Return to hotel and enjoy the remainder of the afternoon on your own
Dinner on your own, Ayelet Host can assist you with reservations

Endtitle: Overnight at the Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

Title: Assaf Harofeh Medical Center & Reception Hosted by CHW Netanya Technological High School
sub_title: Breakfast at The Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

sub_content.bullet_data: Depart from hotel and drive to Assaf Harofeh Medical Center
Explore the work of physicians, nurses and staff at Assaf Harofeh Medical Center and enjoy lunch at the facility

sub_content1.data: Hosted by CHW Netanya Technological High School Patisserie Program at Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv
Yam Hall, M Floor, Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv
Dinner on your own, Ayelet Host can assist you with reservations

Endtitle: Overnight at the Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

Title: Time to Relax: Wine & Dine (Farewell to 5-Day Trip Participants)
sub_title: Breakfast at The Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv

sub_content.bullet_data: Please leave your luggage outside your room for pick-up by 9:00 AM
Check-Out of Royal Beach Hotel, Tel Aviv
Depart from hotel and drive to Barkan Winery
Visit Barkan Winery for a tour of this award-winning modern winery. Enjoy wine tasting, followed by lunch at the winery
Check-In to Cramim Resort & Spa and orientation upon arrival
Time to relax before Shabbat

second_title: Optional Shabbat Candle Lighting with Debbie Eisenberg, National President

sub_content1.data: Meet at the entrance to the Geffen Room, Entrance Floor, Cramim Resort & Spa, Kiryat Anavim
Shabbat Dinner together, in a private room
Geffen Room, Entrance Floor, Cramim Resort & Spa, Kiryat Anavim

Endtitle: Overnight at the Cramim Resort & Spa, Kiryat Anavim

Title: Shabbat & Leisure Day
sub_title: Breakfast/Brunch at Cramim Resort & Spa, Kiryat Anavim, served until 12:00 PM

sub_content.bullet_data: Free morning for Shabbat services or to relax
Optional Tours
Optional Tour 1: Walking Tour of Kibbutz Kiryat AnavimDeparture Time: 12:00 PM
Optional Tour 2: Visit to Har Adar, Al-Qastal, and Sataf Departure Time: 11:00 AM
Optional Tour 3: Visit Masada and the Dead Sea Departure Time: 8:00 AM
Optional Tour 4: Bike Tour through Judean Hills Departure Time: 8:30 AM
Time to relax before Shabbat

sub_content1.data: Enjoy dinner at your leisure; from 6:30 PM-9:00 PM
To make a reservation, please dial '0' from your room or go to the Reception Desk
Main Dining Room, Lobby Floor, Cramim Resort & Spa, Kiryat Anavim

Endtitle: Overnight at the Cramim Resort & Spa, Kiryat Anavim
